code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{fetchPosts}from"../services/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlogList=()=>{const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[visiblePosts,setVisiblePosts]=useState(6);useEffect(()=>{const getPosts=async()=>{const data=await fetchPosts();setPosts(data);};getPosts();},[]);const handleShowMore=()=>{setVisiblePosts(prevVisiblePosts=>prevVisiblePosts+6);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-list",children:[posts.slice(0,visiblePosts).map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-preview",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/post/".concat(post.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:post.image,alt:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[post.content.substring(0,100),"..."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Read more"})]})},post.id)),visiblePosts<posts.length&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleShowMore,className:"show-more",children:"Show More"})]});};export default BlogList;
